title: Watch AW-7
summary: analog watch face for android wear
description: Round watch face for Android Wear device. The application supports 12/24 time format to show time as digital clock and all languages to show the current date.To control watch face appearence just touch on it: * Left top corner: set font face; * Right top corner: show date and digital clock on/off; * Bottom left corner: change colors by round. There are 3 kinds of color.
descriptionHTML:
Round watch face for Android Wear device. The application supports 12/24 time format to show time as digital clock and all languages to show the current date.
To control watch face appearence just touch on it:
* Left top corner: set font face;
* Right top corner: show date and digital clock on/off;
* Bottom left corner: change colors by round. There are 3 kinds of color.
comments: My new favourite on my Huawei.  The second hand sometimes stops.  If you can fix that I would happily give it 5 stars!
